Title: Shiori Novella
GameText: POWER: Play or salvage 1 One-Shot card. If you did not play a card this way, draw 1 card.

Title: "Seiso" Terminology
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Shiori deals 1 target 2 psychic damage. 
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
1 ally deals 1 target 4 irreducible psychic damage.

Title: Knowledge for All
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Shiori deals up to 3 targets 1 psychic damage each.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
1 ally deals up to 3 targets 2 psychic damage each.

Title: Shiorin!
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Draw 3 cards.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
You may use 1 power.

Title: Educational Content
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Each Hero may draw 1 card.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
1 ally Hero may play 1 card.

Title: Dangerous Recall
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Put up to 1 card from your trash under an Archive card.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
Summon 1 Ongoing card.

Title: Zero Filter
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Play 1 card from your hand, activating only its ðŸ““ ARCHIVED text.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
Salvage up to 2 cards.

Title: "Fixing"
GameText:
You may discover 1 Archive card. If you do, Shiori deals 1 Hero target 1 fixed sonic damage.
Destroy 1 Ongoing card.
ðŸ““ ARCHIVED
1 Hero may discover 1 Ongoing card. If no card is played this way, that Hero draws 1 card.

Title: Archive of Power
GameText:
After you play a One-Shot card from your hand, you may put it under this card.
POWER: Shiori deals 1 target X psychic damage, where X is the number of cards under this card. Play 1 card from under this card, activating only its ðŸ““ ARCHIVED text.

Title: Archive of Life
GameText:
After you play a One-Shot card from your hand, you may put it under this card.
POWER: Up to X targets regain 3 HP each, where X is the number of cards under this card. Play 1 card from under this card, activating only its ðŸ““ ARCHIVED text.

Title: Archive of Knowledge
GameText:
After you play a One-Shot card from your hand, you may put it under this card.
POWER: Draw X cards, where X is the number of cards under this card. Play 1 card from under this card, activating only its ðŸ““ ARCHIVED text.

Title: Archive of Revelation
GameText:
After you play a One-Shot card from your hand, you may put it under this card.
POWER: Reveal the top X cards of 1 deck, where X is the number of cards under this card. Discard or bury 1 of them, replace the rest in any order. Play 1 card from under this card, activating only its ðŸ““ ARCHIVED text.

Title: Forbidden Archival
GameText:
After using a power on an Archive card, play all non-Hero cards under that Archive card.
REACTION: Put 1 One-Shot card currently being resolved under an Archive card with no other cards under it. Shiori deals herself 3 fixed psychic damage.

Title: Scissors
GameText:
START PHASE
Put 1 card from your trash under an Archive card.
POWER: Destroy all cards under an Archive card. Shiori deals 1 target X infernal damage, where X is 2 times the number of cards destroyed this way. Then, destroy that Archive card.

Title: Motormouth
GameText:
PLAY PHASE
Put up to 1 card from your hand under an Archive card.
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase.

Title: Endless Tangents
GameText:
After you play a card from under an Archive card, you may bury it from your trash and draw 1 card.
DRAW PHASE
You may draw an additional card this phase.

Title: Cursed Knowledge
GameText:
After Shiori deals an ally target sonic damage, the associated Hero may draw 1 card.
END PHASE
1 target dealt damage by Shiori this turn may regain 2 HP.
